DOC.brief_summary: In uncontrolled , non-randomized , prospective , local post-marketed surveillance study , data obtain safety efficacy LEVITRA® routine treatment erectile dysfunction . The general objective evaluate product safety ( primarily record adverse event ) , efficacy patient acceptance .
DOC.criteria: Any adult patient ( > /=18 year ) erectile dysfunction treat LEVITRA® . Patients must able give write informed consent participation study receive detailed write oral information prior study . Exclusion criterion must read conjunction product information ( Package Insert ) .
